name: Faulty Winch - Mini Jam 60
description:
You are a thief trying to steal some heavily secured treasure.

Unfortunately the trusty winch you use to lower yourself is broken, and can only pause or un-pause, rather than change direction. Your rope is also acting up, and not bending at all.

Created for Mini Jam 60

Credits:

Font used: https://managore.itch.io/m3x6

Sound-effects created using https://beepbox.co/

Pixel Art Palette  https://lospec.com/palette-list/matriax8c
